project(trial2d-vendor-native)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE)

if(APPLE)
    if(IOS)
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework AudioToolbox")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework AVFoundation")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework Foundation")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework Metal")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework MetalKit")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework UIKit")
    else()
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework AudioToolbox")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework Cocoa")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework CoreAudio")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework Metal")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework MetalKit")
        target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-framework QuartzCore")
    endif()
elseif(EMSCRIPTEN)
    target_link_options(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE "-s MIN_WEBGL_VERSION=1 -s MAX_WEBGL_VERSION=1")
else()
    find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE OpenGL::GL)
endif()
